definition: lit. by the thousands and tens of thousands (idiom); untold numbers/innumerable/thousands upon thousands
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: All this is a blank to thousands upon thousands of well-intentioned people.
sentences.chinese: 這一切，成千成萬的善良人是不知道的。

sentences.english: It threatens to shatter the lives of millions of our people.
sentences.chinese: 它威脅着要粉碎成千成萬美國人的生活。

sentences.english: He has taught millions and millions of young men.
sentences.chinese: 她曾教過成千成萬的青年人。
